message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL 

The paper discusses methods for arranging words semantically using thesauri, which is a common task in natural language processing and computational linguistics. The three major applications mentioned in the paper (dictionary construction, tagged corpus construction, and information presentation system) are all relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI), and deep learning (cs.DL). Therefore, these are the most likely sub-categories for this paper.
